content.query:
CREATE SCHEMA ext
GO

DROP SCHEMA ext
GO

CREATE SCHEMA prod
GO

-- Create external table for Taxi Zones
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.TaxiZones
(
	LocationId INT,
	Borough NVARCHAR(100),
	Zone NVARCHAR(100),
    ServiceZone NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = DataLakeSrc
  , FILE_FORMAT = CSVFileFormat  
  , LOCATION='/raw/taxidata/TaxiZones1.csv'  
)
GO

SELECT * FROM ext.TaxiZones
GO

-- Drop external table
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE ext.TaxiZones

-- Recreate external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.TaxiZones
(
	LocationId INT,
	Borough NVARCHAR(100),
	Zone NVARCHAR(100),
    ServiceZone NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH
(
    DATA_SOURCE = DataLakeSrc
  , FILE_FORMAT = CSVFileFormat  
  , LOCATION='/raw/taxidata/'    
  , REJECT_TYPE = VALUE
  , REJECT_VALUE = 1
  , REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION='/raw/errors/TaxiZones'
)
GO

SELECT * FROM ext.TaxiZones


SELECT * FROM prod.TaxiZones

-- Create a local table by reading from external table
CREATE TABLE prod.TaxiZones
WITH 
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
) 
AS 
SELECT * 
FROM ext.TaxiZones
OPTION (LABEL = 'Load prod.TaxiZones');


-- Check the load status

-- Check the table
SELECT * FROM prod.TaxiZones
